activity.title: Activity 1
activity.instructions: First, read each description. Then listen. Match the correct number to each description.

match.rightitem: Zhang Zi Yi is a movie actress from Beijing, China. She is very pretty. She has straight, black hair and dark brown eyes. She has one brother.
Gerard Depardieu is an actor from France. He is handsome. He has dark blonde hair and blue eyes.
Rob Reiner is a movie director. He is bald with blue eyes and a gray beard. He’s from New York City, in the U.S.
Caetano Veloso is a singer and songwriter from Bahia in Brazil. He’s very handsome with wavy, black hair. His eyes are brown.
Julia Roberts is an actress from the U.S. She is tall with long, red hair and pretty brown eyes. Her brother, Eric Roberts, is an actor too.
